Translations.Text: Truly, God is my protector, Who sent down the Book. And He takes into His protection the ones in accord with morality
And those whom you call to other than Him, they are not able to help you, nor are they able to help themselves
And if you call them to the guidance, they hear not. Thou hast seen them look on thee, but they perceive not
Take the extra and command what is honorable. And turn aside from the ones who are ignorant
But if enmity is sown by Satan in thee, sowing enmity, then, seek refuge in God. Truly, He is Hearing, Knowing
Truly, those who were Godfearing when they were touched by a visitation from Satan, they recollected. That is when they were ones who perceive
And their brothers/sisters cause them to increase in error, and, again, they never stop short

When thou hast not approached them with a sign, they said: Why hadst thou not improvised one? Say: I follow only what is revealed to me from my Lord. This is clear evidence from your Lord and guidance and mercy for a folk who believe
And when the Quran was recited, listen and pay heed so that perhaps you will find mercy
And remember thy Lord in thyself humbly and with awe instead of openly publishing the sayings at the first part of the day and the eventide. And be thou not among the ones who are heedless
Truly, those who are with thy Lord grow not arrogant from His worship. And they glorify Him and they prostrate themselves to Him.â€¡
